file.name: Point, Click, Quilt! Turn Your Photos into Fabulous Fabric Art - 16 Projects, Fusible Applique, Thread Sketching & More.epub

tika.dc.description: Susan Brubaker Knapp teaches quilters how to compose and shoot dynamic digital photos from a quilter's perspective. With fun, creative workshop-like exercises in art quilting, you'll learn how to turn those photos into small art quilts, both realistic and abstract, combining traditional fabrics with innovative materials. Every quilter can succeed with Susan's achievable designs and accessible techniques.
